purpose: Handles navigation to files, functions, endpoints, and other code locations when users interact with the product navigator and analysis viewer.
userVisibleActions: Opens files in the editor when clicking on file items in the navigator
Jumps to specific functions within files and highlights the function location
Navigates to API endpoints and displays their location in code
Shows error messages when files cannot be opened or locations cannot be found
Displays code previews and details for selected items
Navigates to entry points and highlights their definitions
Opens and positions cursor at specific line numbers in files
developerVisibleActions: Resolves relative and absolute file paths within the workspace
Searches for function definitions within opened documents
Handles navigation from ProductNavItem and AnalysisItem structures
Manages editor focus and cursor positioning after navigation
Converts between different item types (product items, analysis items, entry points)
Provides error handling and user feedback for failed navigation attempts
Supports navigation to various item types: files, functions, endpoints, classes, methods

keyFunctions.name: navigateToProductItem
keyFunctions.desc: Navigates to a product navigation item (file, function, endpoint)
keyFunctions.inputs: ProductNavItem containing file path, function name, and type information
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - opens document and positions cursor

keyFunctions.name: navigateToAnalysisItem
keyFunctions.desc: Navigates to an analysis viewer item
keyFunctions.inputs: AnalysisItem with file and location details
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - opens document at specified location

keyFunctions.name: navigateToEntryPoint
keyFunctions.desc: Navigates to an entry point definition
keyFunctions.inputs: EntryPoint with file path and position information
keyFunctions.outputs: Promise<void> - opens file and highlights entry point

keyFunctions.name: showItemDetails
keyFunctions.desc: Displays detailed information about a selected item
keyFunctions.inputs: Item object with metadata and description
keyFunctions.outputs: void - shows details panel or quick pick with information

keyFunctions.name: findFunctionInDocument
keyFunctions.desc: Searches for a function definition within an open document
keyFunctions.outputs: Position or Range where function is located, or undefined if not found

intent: Separates navigation concerns from the main extension code, providing a centralized handler for all file and code location navigation triggered by user interactions with the product navigator and analysis viewer trees. Solves the problem of scattered navigation logic by consolidating it into a single, testable module.
